name: CARNAGE (itch) (Revolution Game)
description:
Unleash the fury and cause a scene of Carnage! Kill as much human as possible before they touch you. It is strongly advised that you turn the volume lower first, then do modification on it since I don't have time to add volume bar

Created for Alekstudio JAM! and Drifty Jam (v.5) (Survival theme). Took me 3 hours or something don't expect this to be a polished one.

Main Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Attack
Chain Combo:

When you hit more than 1 enemy with the same attack, you attack once more without any attack cooldown penalty.

Tip:

Enemies only spawn on the edge of the arena, so it is more wise to stay in the middle.

Check this maybe
